original_title: Love Bite: Laurie Lipton and Her Disturbing Black & White Drawings
overview: With millions of tiny strokes of her humble pencil, Laurie Liptonâ€™s haunted images seek answers to some of the most uncomfortable themes in our culture. But what compels her to live a life of isolation drawing is neither black nor white.
title: Love Bite: Laurie Lipton and Her Disturbing Black & White Drawings
